name: BOILING PLANET
description:
A game made under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46!

  • The planet's temperature is rising faster and faster, turning the terrain into sand!
  • And sand, after a while, collapses!
  • But when it rains, the weary land refreshes!
  • But when there is no rain, rain filled holes support the land!
  • When the soil is wet, grass can grow and spread!
  • When it rains, grown grass gives you coins, letting you buy useful tools!
  • Have more grass when the clock stops ticking, to get a higher score!
  • Fully grown grass worths triple the points!
  • Get a higher score to unlock further levels!

Need more info?

  • There is a tutorial in the first level, but this page already told you everything.
  • WASD to move the camera,
  • Left Click to use tools, Right click to cancel using them,
  • and ESC for menu.

Features, that didn't make it?

  • Trees. Would have been a gameplay changer mechanic.
  • Water flowing mechanics.
  • More complex grass mechnics.
  • Difficulties.
  • More levels.
  • Fleshed out graphics and sound.

Changelog

  • Uploaded a newer version with balanced parameters, because to old version was too easy.
  • Uploaded another version, because as it turns out, on some machines the game was harder than it should have been :D  Sorry!

Post Mortem soon at: www.youtube.com/Tudvari

Thanks for playing, and share you highscores! :)

Ps.: The Android version wasn't intended, so it could be a worse experience than other platforms. Keep this in mind when rating :)
